name: Laas Geel
description_en: By far the best-known landmark in Somalia, Laas Geel is a series of caves in Somaliland with Neolithic paintings dating back to 9000 BC. Though not recognized by UNESCO due to Somaliland’s status, it clearly meets the criteria. Visitors must be accompanied by a guide.
description_so: Laas Geel waa goobta ugu caansan Soomaaliya, waa silsilad godad ah oo ku yaalla Somaliland, kuwaas oo leh rinjiyeyaal qadiimi ah oo dib ugu laabanaya 9000 BC. Inkastoo aan la aqoonsan UNESCO sababo la xiriira xaaladda Somaliland, waxay si cad u buuxinaysaa shuruudaha. Booqdayaasha waa inay la socdaan hagitaan.

name: Kismayo National Park
description_en: Kismayo National Park is in the southwestern region of Somalia and features native East African wildlife like Somali sheep and wild ass. Visitors can enjoy safari tours to see lions, leopards, zebras, and more.
description_so: Beerta Qaranka Kismaayo waxay ku taallaa gobolka koonfur-galbeed ee Soomaaliya, waxayna hoy u tahay xayawaanka bariga Afrika sida riyaha Soomaalida iyo dameerka duurjoogta ah. Martidu waxay ku raaxaysan karaan safarrada safari si ay u arkaan libaaxyada, shabeelka, zebra, iyo kuwa kale.

name: Berbera Seaside
description_en: Berbera Seaside in the Sahil region offers pristine beaches, clear waters, and excellent spots for scuba diving, fishing, and snorkeling. Coral reefs in the area are among the world’s best.
description_so: Xeebta Berbera oo ku taal gobolka Saaxil waxay bixisaa xeebo qurux badan, biyo nadiif ah, iyo meelo ku fiican quusitaanka, kalluumeysiga, iyo quusitaanka neefmareenka. Buuraha coral-ka ee deegaankani waxay ka mid yihiin kuwa ugu wanaagsan adduunka.

name: Hargeisa Provincial Museum
description_en: Open since 1977, the Hargeisa Provincial Museum displays artifacts representing Somali culture, many donated by local residents. It once formed part of a larger cultural center with a library and theater.
description_so: Tan iyo 1977, Matxafka Gobolka Hargeysa wuxuu soo bandhigayaa alaabo ka tarjumaysa dhaqanka Soomaalida, kuwaas oo badankood ay deeq u bixiyeen dadka deegaanka. Wuxuu mar ka mid ahaa xarun dhaqameed ballaaran oo ay ku jirtay maktabad iyo theater.

name: National Museum of Somalia
description_en: Located in Mogadishu, the National Museum of Somalia houses artifacts of cultural significance, including weaponry, artwork, and coins. The building itself, once built for the Sultan of Zanzibar, is of historical interest.
description_so: Matxafka Qaranka Soomaaliya oo ku yaal Muqdisho wuxuu kaydiyaa alaab muhiim ah oo dhaqan ah, oo ay ku jiraan hub, farshaxan, iyo lacago. Dhismaha laftiisu, oo markii hore loogu talagalay Sultaan-ka Zanzibar, wuxuu leeyahay taariikh muhiim ah.

name: Naasa Hablood
description_en: Naasa Hablood ('Virgin’s Breast Mountains') are twin hills on the outskirts of Hargeisa. Popular with both locals and tourists, they offer unique natural scenery but limited historical insight.
description_so: Naasa Hablood waa labo buurood oo ku yaalla duleedka magaalada Hargeysa. Waxay caan ku yihiin dadka deegaanka iyo dalxiiseyaasha labadaba, waxayna bixiyaan aragti dabiici ah oo gaar ah inkastoo aysan lahayn macluumaad taariikhi ah oo ballaaran.
